headline: Why Citizens Financial is the regional bank stock to own
summary: Citizens Financial Group (CFG) received a stock upgrade to Overweight by Morgan Stanley analysts over the regional bank's improvements in credit, its return on tangible common equity (ROTCE), and its lowering of capital requirements. Citizens President Brendan Coughlin sits down with Julie Hyman to uncover the so-called "why behind the high" as Citizens shares have risen 20% year-to-date in 2025. Coughlin discusses the company's private bank segment, its margins, and how the Federal Reserve's interest rate cuts could affect its business. To watch more expert insights and analysis on the latest market action, check out more Market Catalysts.
